summary: Provides test fixtures and a suite of unit tests that verify the correct operation of adapter modules within diffusion models, covering component initialization, input handling, low‑cost model (LCM) behavior, custom timestep handling, attention slicing, batch inference consistency, multi‑dimensional image processing, and xformers‑based attention forward passes.
business_intent: Ensure that adapter integrations are robust, performant, and compatible with various model configurations and attention mechanisms, thereby reducing regression risk and supporting reliable deployment of diffusion pipelines.
